attributes.additional_details: Ban the use of twin/multi-rig fishing in area iv , as inshore fishermen are fully aware the method of twin/multi-rig fishing is proving too efficient to our already venerable fishing grounds which will cause a collapse in a prawn fishery in the area of iv . We need this to be highlighted and action to be taken in order to stop prawn stocks becoming extinct and need as many people as possible to support us as this effects fishermen , processors and even the local shops all around the coast
